content: Do not deviate from the plan - if you think you need to deviate, STOP and ask the user for guidance
Run echo -e "\e]2;Implementation: Complete Extractor Migration Cleanup\007" to set terminal title
Remove the ParamExtractor trait from brp_tools/request_handler/traits.rs (delete lines 17-24)
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after removing ParamExtractor trait
Update config.rs: remove ParamExtractor import and param_extractor field from BrpHandlerConfig
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after updating config.rs
Update handler.rs: remove the fallback logic (lines 42-51) that checks for config.param_extractor
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after updating handler.rs
Update tool_generator.rs: remove param_extractor: None from the config (line 232)
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after updating tool_generator.rs
If there are test issues, STOP and review them with the user
Task a new subagent to do a code review focusing on duplication, complexity, and validating the implementation
When code review subagent returns, STOP and review the suggested changes with the user
